comment.author: 66311327@N05
comment._content: Colonel Henry Goslee Prout (H'Y = Henry), First Vice President and General Manager of the Union Switch and Signal Co., was a witness at the Thompson Committee, see New-York tribune., December 18, 1915, Page 2, column 5 See also www.ebooksread.com/authors-eng/inc-new-jersey-genealogica... Senator George Thompson:

comment.author: 35234565@N04
comment._content: Thank you B-59 for connecting Col. Prout to the Thompson Committee. We'll add some of the information to this record the next time we update.

comment.author: 35234565@N04
comment._content: Thank you also, B-59, for noticing how the initials in the caption became a bit tangled. We'll fix that too.
